name: fifteen
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A1 the number 15: They live about fifteen miles away. "How old is your sister?" "Fifteen."
More examplesFewer examplesThey hadn't lost an election in fifteen years.She was barely fifteen when she won her first championship.She has served on the committee for the last fifteen years.He's decided to stand down after fifteen years as managing director.The levels of trade union and political activism in this country have greatly declined in the past fifteen years.

a team of fifteen players, for example in rugby union: The Welsh fifteen won a crushing victory over Fiji at the weekend.starting fifteen The starting fifteen boast over 420 caps between them.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was the youngest player in the first fifteen.The club fields three fifteens at the weekend.
